nachos.filesys

Class Folder

  • java.lang.Object
    • nachos.machine.OpenFile
      • nachos.filesys.File
        • nachos.filesys.Folder

  • public class Folder
extends File
    Folder is a special type of file used to implement hierarchical filesystem. It maintains a map from filename to the address of the file. There's a special folder called root folder with pre-defined address. It's the origin from where you traverse the entire filesystem.
    Author:
    starforever
